0: paid Wi Fi which is strange these days
Wifi is charged for and is a bit pricey when most places offer free wifi
there is a charge albeithe alternative gated area is free
The outdoor car park is free but a bit rough and uneven though that is not a major problem and there is an indoor paid for car park available too
Is there a reason for this because the price has remained the same
Wifi within the hotel is an eye watering 15 Euros per 24 hours
One minus was the paid internet
There is also a charge for use of the underground car park
The fact that I was asked to sign up for a loyalty card or else pay 15 euro a day for Wifi
Expensive WiFi in rooms very slow in lobby
1: Off season rates are amazing thru booking com
2: Food on offer rated at 100 quality produce fit for a King
it is a good hotel and good value for money and would stay here again and if the wifi charges were not so excessive I would have probably given 5 stars
Sunbeds on the beach are also free of charge
Beach club accessible by free shuttle transfer however even the hotel guests have to pay for sun beds
For the price of the hotel and the four star rating I just expected more from this hotel
I had probably stay here again due to the hotels convenience location and price
This hotel charges extra for everything even the safe key
Pictures posted are very deceiving and not what you pay for
I would rate this hotel as a three star at the most
